plugin.name: Polar
plugin.summary: Polar Plugin makes polar diagrams for Weather Routing Predictions
plugin.author: Peter Tulp
plugin.description: Polar Plugin reads VDR data files directly, reads from Opencpn input Nmea channel (Record Start/Stop at bottom) and direct from LogBoookKonni records, to creates a polar diagram which can then be edited manually, saved or loaded as a Boat Polar file. The LogbookKonni selection has several options.

plugin.name: windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: StatusBar
plugin.summary: StatusBar Plugin is an optional replacement for the builtin statusbar
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: The builtin status bar (disable from the User Interface tab) has limited configuration options and can be very difficult to read. The statusbar plugin improves on some of these difficulties. Best used with OpenGL enabled (requires some basic OpenGL extensions).

plugin.summary: GPS Odometer plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: LennartG
plugin.description: GPS controlled Dashboard based Odometer plugin for OpenCPN, displays GPS calculated Log and Trip information

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: Climatology
plugin.summary: Climatology PlugIn: 32 years of monthly NOAA Data
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Climatology provides overlay capabilities for historic weather data. Supported Climatology types include: - Average wind directions and speed- Percentage of gale and calm conditions - Sea Surface Currents - Average swell and sea state (not yet implemented) - Precipitation, Humidity, Cloud Cover, and Lightning Strikes - Monthly average Sea Level pressure and Sea Temperature, Air Temperature - Tropical Cyclone tracks

plugin.name: GPS Odometer
plugin.summary: GPS Odometer plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: LennartG
plugin.description: GPS controlled Dashboard based Odometer plugin for OpenCPN, displays GPS calculated Log and Trip information

plugin.name: DR
plugin.summary: Plugin to make GPX files for dead reckoning positions
plugin.author: Rasbats
plugin.description: DR creates GPX files for dead reckoning positions

plugin.name: Watchdog
plugin.summary: Implement watchdog ability for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Multiple Configurable alarms for changing conditions for boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman, etc.

plugin.name: Celestial Navigation
plugin.summary: Celestial Navigation Plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Implements nautical almanac for sun, moon, planets and various navigational stars. Compute position fix from celestial measurements.

plugin.name: windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: oeSENC
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for encrypted OCPN Vector Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.name: ShipDriver
plugin.summary: Ship movements simulator - or is it a game?
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Simulates navigation of a vessel. Using the sail option and a current grib file for wind data, simulates how a sailing vessel might react in those conditions. Using 'Preferences' the simulator is able to record AIS data from itself. This can be replayed to simulate collision situations.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin and Navico radar support Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files directly or decode audio faxes to an image. With simple calibration, resulting image is overlaid on top of charts. Builtin database for internet retrieval from meterological site.

The LogbookKonni selection has several options.

plugin.name: oeRNC Charts
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for encrypted OCPN Raster Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.name: NmeaConverter_pi
plugin.summary: Plugin to change and cherrypich from other NMEA sentences
plugin.author: RooieDirk
plugin.description: NmeaConverter is a plugin where you can manipulate or add new nmea sentences. It is rather tricky and easy to make mistakes that will 'hang' OpenCPN, but if used right very powerfull

plugin.name: WeatherFax
plugin.summary: Open fax image files or decode audio faxes and overlay on chart
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files directly or decode audio faxes to an image. With simple calibration, resulting image is overlaid on top of charts. Converts images in mercator, polar, conic and uniform coordinates. Can convert any image into a raster chart. Builtin database for HF radio fax stations via SSB. Builtin database for internet retrieval from meterological site.

plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Simulates navigation of a vessel. Using the sail option and a current grib file for wind data, simulates how a sailing vessel might react in those conditions. Using 'Preferences' the simulator is able to record AIS data from itself. This can be replayed to simulate collision situations.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin and Navico radar support Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: NmeaConverter_pi
plugin.summary: Plugin to change and cherrypich from other NMEA sentences
plugin.author: RooieDirk
plugin.description: NmeaConverter is a plugin where you can manipulate or add new nmea sentences. It is rather tricky and easy to make mistakes that will 'hang' OpenCPN, but if used right very powerfull

plugin.name: VDR
plugin.summary: Voyage Data Recorder and Player
plugin.author: Jean-Eudes Onfray
plugin.description: VDR Voyage Data Recorder Use Voyage Data Recorder (VDR) to record and play NMEA files. Save NMEA stream to a file. Replay NMEA stream previously saved. Plugin by Seth Dart

plugin.name: Polar
plugin.summary: Polar Plugin makes polar diagrams for Weather Routing Predictions
plugin.author: Peter Tulp
plugin.description: Polar Plugin reads VDR data files directly, reads from Opencpn input Nmea channel (Record Start/Stop at bottom) and direct from LogBoookKonni records, to creates a polar diagram which can then be edited manually, saved or loaded as a Boat Polar file. The LogbookKonni selection has several options.

plugin.name: VDR
plugin.summary: Voyage Data Recorder and Player
plugin.author: Jean-Eudes Onfray
plugin.description: VDR Voyage Data Recorder Use Voyage Data Recorder (VDR) to record and play NMEA files. Save NMEA stream to a file. Replay NMEA stream previously saved. Plugin by Seth Dart

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: WeatherFax
plugin.summary: Open fax image files or decode audio faxes and overlay on chart
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files directly or decode audio faxes to an image. With simple calibration, resulting image is overlaid on top of charts. Converts images in mercator, polar, conic and uniform coordinates. Can convert any image into a raster chart. Builtin database for HF radio fax stations via SSB. Builtin database for internet retrieval from meterological site.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin and Navico radar support Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

The LogbookKonni selection has several options.

plugin.summary: StatusBar Plugin is an optional replacement for the builtin statusbar
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: The builtin status bar (disable from the User Interface tab) has limited configuration options and can be very difficult to read. The statusbar plugin improves on some of these difficulties. Best used with OpenGL enabled (requires some basic OpenGL extensions).

plugin.name: WeatherFax
plugin.summary: Open fax image files or decode audio faxes and overlay on chart
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files directly or decode audio faxes to an image. With simple calibration, resulting image is overlaid on top of charts. Converts images in mercator, polar, conic and uniform coordinates. Can convert any image into a raster chart. Builtin database for HF radio fax stations via SSB. Builtin database for internet retrieval from meterological site.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin and Navico radar support Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: oeSENC
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for encrypted OCPN Vector Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin and Navico radar support Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: WeatherFax
plugin.summary: Open fax image files or decode audio faxes and overlay on chart
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files directly or decode audio faxes to an image. With simple calibration, resulting image is overlaid on top of charts. Converts images in mercator, polar, conic and uniform coordinates. Can convert any image into a raster chart. Builtin database for HF radio fax stations via SSB. Builtin database for internet retrieval from meterological site.
